1194.name: Dur R (Ni)
1194.Applications: Dur R (Ni) offers the highest available wear resistance of all hardfacing alloys in most applications.  The deposit offers excellent corrosion resistance combined with tungsten carbides for long life span in extreme applications.
1194.Suitable_For: Dur R (Ni) can be applied on all sorts of steels except on cast iron or Mn-steel. The main applications are hardfacing and rebuilding of stabilisers and other oilfield tools where maximum protection is required. Also for augers, impellers, mixer plates in the brick and clay industry and on decanter screws in the food and chemical industry where corrosion resistance is needed.
